channel.title: employment spillovers on Maarten Goos
channel.description: Recent content in employment spillovers on Maarten Goos

item.title: Local High-Tech Job Multipliers in Europe
item.description: This article finds that each worker in a high-skilled occupation creates up to five extra jobs in local less-skilled-intensive services in the same region. However, it is also shown that there exist persistent differences in the size of this local high-tech job multiplier across regions.
